content: hi all this is my first crochet pattern this pattern is catered towards beginners but is welcome for all i wanted to design an airtag holder that is a flower shape but not too big / bulky i found that this pattern make a perfectly snug holder that is still small enough to keep on your keychain techniques used * magic_ring * single_crochet * double_crochet * slip_stitch * chain please dm me with any questions or suggestions
